caption.p: RNA-binding proteins targeted in the RNAi screen

td.p: Neuro-oncological ventral antigen
Neuronal migration, axon outgrowth, and axon guidance defects
Polypyrimidinetract-binding protein
Splicing factor proline/glutamine rich (polypyrimidine tract-binding protein associated)
Fragile X mental retardation protein
Nuclear FMRP interacting protein
ELAV (embryonically lethal abnormal vision) homolog; Hu syndrome protein
Partial midline crossing defect caused by Elavl2 single RNAi
RNA-binding protein, Fox (feminizing locus on X) homolog
Musashi RNA-binding protein
Msi1-/- displays neuronal migration and axon guidance defects in precerebellar neurons but not in spinal commissural neurons (Kuwako et al., 2010)
UPF1 regulator of nonsense transcripts homolog
Neuronal migration, axon outgrowth, and axon guidance defects
CUG binding protein, Elav-like family member
KH-type splicing regulatory protein
Poly(A) binding protein, cytoplasmic
Insulin-like growth factor 2 mRNA binding protein
Partial midline crossing defect
Regulates beta-actin mRNA transport and translation (Leung et al., 2006; Yao et al., 2006)
Serine/arginine-rich protein specific kinase

tr.td: -, no phenotype in spinal cord commissural neurons, when family members were targeted individually.
